Suspicious network scans or queries pote.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek dce_rpc.log, Zeek weird.log
Suspicious network scans or queries pote.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for scans (high volume to multiple destinations/ports) or specific queries (Zeek dce_rpc.log, weird.log) originating from external IPs. Use descriptive statistics (e.g., connection frequency by source IP/port) to identify outliers.

Unusual connection patterns or requests.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Zeek ssl.log
Unusual connection patterns or requests.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for connections to ports/services potentially exposing system details. Analyze Zeek http.log or ssl.log for requests/certificates that might reveal server/firmware versions. Use correlation analysis to link suspicious connections to known reconnaissance tools or patterns.
